titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to remove freshwater mussels from the list of endangered and threatened species.
Modifying Unaccountable Standards and Simplifying Endangered Lists
Modifying Unaccountable Standards and Simplifying Endangered Lists
MUSSELS Act
MUSSELS Act
MUSSELS Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Modifying Unaccountable Standards and Simplifying Endangered Lists or the MUSSELS Act
This bill directs the Department of Interior to remove freshwater mussels from the list of endangered and threatened species.
